#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int GCD( int a, int b ) {

	if( ( a % b ) == 0 )
		return b;
	else
		return GCD( b, a % b );
}

int StrToInt( string s ) {
	
	int i, n, sum = 0;
	n = s.length();
	
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
		sum = ( sum * 10 ) + ( s[ i ] - '0' );
	
	return sum;
}

int main() {
	
	int n, j, len, k, numer, numer1, numer2, deno, ct = 1, i, g;
	
	scanf("%d", &j );
	
	while( j != -1 ) {
		
		string s, denoStr;
		
		cin >> s;
		len = s.length();
		n = len - 2;
		
		if( n == j ) {
			numer = StrToInt( s.substr( 2, n ) );
			denoStr = "";
			for( i = 0;i < j;i++ )
				denoStr += '9';
			deno = StrToInt( denoStr );
		}
		else {

			numer1 = StrToInt( s.substr( 2, n ) );
			numer2 = StrToInt( s.substr(2, n - j ) );
			numer = numer1 - numer2;
			denoStr = "";
			for( i = 0;i < j;i++ )
				denoStr += '9';
			for( i = 0;i < ( n - j );i++ )
				denoStr += '0';
			deno = StrToInt( denoStr );
		}

		g = GCD( numer, deno );
		numer /= g;
		deno /= g;

		printf( "Case %d: %d/%d\n", ct, numer, deno );
		ct++;

		scanf("%d", &j );
	}

	return 0;
}
